name: Apple Watch SE
about: The Apple Watch SE was released in 2020 as a more affordable alternative to the Series 7, coming in at a starting price of $279 / Â£269. While the SE lacks the always-on display and ECG app, the smartwatch tracks activity, sleep, and calories burned and will notify you when a high or low heart rate is detected. The water-resistant smartwatch also helps you stay connected with the ability to receive notifications, take calls, and reply to texts directly from your wrist. Case Material: Stainless Steel | Case Size: 34 mm x 34mm | Case Thickness: 0 mm | Case Shape: Round | Case Back Type: Snap-down

name: Samsung Galaxy Watch 4
about: The Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 was released last year and is packed with health and fitness features, including activity and sleep tracking and advanced heart rate monitoring that will notify you when an irregular heartbeat is detected. You're also getting a slim, lightweight design, GPS technology, and a two-day battery life. Case Material: Stainless Steel | Case Size: 34 mm x 34mm | Case Thickness: 0 mm | Case Shape: Round | Case Back Type: Snap-down

name: Fitbit Sense
about: Released last year, the Fitbit Sense is packed with advanced health features and GPS technology while also keeping you connected with apps, messaging, and notifications. The swimproof smartwatch tracks activity, heart rate, and sleep and includes an EDA Scan app that detects electrodermal activity, which claims to indicate your body's response to stress. Case Material: Stainless Steel | Case Size: 34 mm x 34mm | Case Thickness: 0 mm | Case Shape: Round | Case Back Type: Snap-down

name: HOWARD MILLER AVERY DUAL-TONE PENDULUM WALL CLOCK 625-385
about: This dual tone wall clock finished with Rustic Cherry and Vintage Umber gives your wall the most decorative look. Wooden stick pendulum gives this clock an artistic look. The dial with two-color wood tone beneath convex crystal glass along with Arabic numerals complements the delicacy of this timepiece. This dual tone wall clock features a handsome Rustic Cherry finish with a contrasting Vintage Umber inset panel. The wood stick pendulum features a spun brass-finished bob. Beneath a convex glass crystal, the dial features a two color wood-tone dial with gold Arabic numerals and aged brass-tone spade hands. Quartz, battery operated movement. Finished in distressed Rustic Cherry on select hardwoods and veneers. | H. 27-1/2â³ (70 cm) | W. 11-1/2â³ (29 cm)

name: HOWARD MILLER JENNISON MECHANICAL WALL CLOCK 612-221
about: This is a beautifully designed and carefully crafted pendulum wall clock that is guaranteed to bring character to your home. Beveled glass decorates the front door of this clocks, which goes well with its polished brass lyre pendulum that swings on a beat plate. A unique clock that features a highly polished Viennese dial that is overlaid with individual convex chapter rings and center disk; finalized with an enameled finish. Upon buying this clock you'll notice it's Vintage Mahogany finished made on select high-quality hardwoods and veneers. An individually carved, scalloped shell on the pediment is designed similar to a John Goddard original. The highly polished Viennese dial is overlaid with individual convex chapter rings and center disc with an enameled finish. The front-opening door offers beveled glass. A polished brass lyre pendulum swings by a beat plate. Key-wound, triple-chime Kieninger movement. Plays choice of Westminster, St. Michael, or Whittington 1/4, 1/2, and 3/4 chimes accordingly with full chime and strike on the hour. Chime silence option and durable bronze bushings. Finished in Vintage Mahogany on select hardwoods and veneers. H. 33-1/2â³ (85 cm) | W. 14-3/4â³ (37 cm)

name: HOWARD MILLER BARRISTER MECHANICAL MANTEL CLOCK 613-180
about: This Howard Miller Barrister Mechanical Mantel Clock introduces a modern feel to your overall dÂcor. The clock features inlays of mahogany and an intricate oval of variegated maples. Warm white face with black numerals and hands, and a brass finished bezel. Featuring fluted columns with wooden column caps grace each side; this clock will surely appeal to the design buff in you and add to the feeling glam. Mahogany finish on select hardwoods and veneers with an intricate oval inlay of variegated maples and madrona burl. The warm white dial features black numerals and hands, and a brass-finished bezel. Fluted columns with wooden column caps grace each side. Durable bronze bushings. Key-wound, Westminster chime Kieninger movement Plays 1/4, 1/2, and 3/4 chimes accordingly with full chime and strike on the hour. Chime silence option and durable bronze bushings Finished in Vintage Mahogany on select hardwoods and veneers. | H. 11-3/4â³ (30 cm) | W. 9-1/2â³ (24 cm)

name: SMALL 8â³ FUSEE DROP DIAL WALL CLOCK
about: Enclosed within a very well-proportioned miniature Mahogany case with locking bottom door and door to side, this 8-day single fusee timepiece with an eight inch flat painted dial, roman numerals and blued steel hands, cast bezel and silvered sight ring. The dial is signed Camerer Kuss & Co.

name: MAHOGANY HOODED WALL CLOCK BY WENHAM & SON OF DEREHAM
about: The clock movement runs for approximately 2-days (without the alarm being wound), is weight driven with anchor escapement and brass bob pendulum. The original painted dial has roman numerals with finely blued steel hands, is signed in the break-arch with alarm to centre. The case is made from solid mahogany with a lockable front glazed door.

name: WEBSTER FUSEE DIAL WALL CLOCK
about: A very rare âtic-tacâ Fusee dial wall clock by Webster of London. 12â³ wooden dial with original paint, brass hands and very fine, locked, cast bezel.  8 day fusee movement features tall plates and âknoppedâ pillars.  Mahogany salt box case with side and bottom doors.

name: FRENCH STRIKING FOUR GLASS MANTEL CLOCK
about: The circular plated movement with hour and half hour strike upon a coiled and blued steel gong via the rack and snail strike system, having a Brocot visible escapement The brass case and bevel-edged glasses to the sides and matched glasses to the front and back, brass framed doors. The two piece, glazed and fired white enamel dial with regulation at XII, has Roman numerals and fine blued steel hands.

name: 625-340 - Gwyneth Wall Clock
about: Contemporary two-tone pendulum wall clock features brushed nickel and satin black finishes. The pendulum has a spun silver finished bob suspended on a silver tone metal stick. The black dial features smartly contrasting silver Arabic numerals and hands. Measures approximately: H: 33' W: 12.5 D: 3' Quartz, battery operated. 1 Year Warranty

name: 645-583 - Weatherton Tabletop Clock
about: Finished in brushed and polished silver-tone, this semicircular metal clock combines contemporary flair with the additional function of a hygrometer and thermometer. The dials feature circular, diamond-cut numeral rings, black Roman numerals, black hour and minute hands, and silver second and alarm hands, and a glass crystal. A full felt bottom protects your tabletop. Quartz, battery-operated, alarm movement includes one AA sized battery. Measures Approximately: H: 3.75' x W: 8' x D: 2' 1 Year Warranty
